Sometimes, images are better in the sidebar. This one is from Robin Ooode

Typography

This website makes use of your browser-native typeface. This way, I don’t have to go down a typeface-buying rabbit hole every time I want to redesign my website, and you don’t have to wait for the page to load.

This is a blockquote.

— Zinzy

Images

While this website isn’t image-heavy, I did provide myself with various options for displaying imagery.

Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they) is a researcher, designer, and queer facilitator from Amsterdam. She's interested in humanities and behavioral sciences, yoga practice, and amateur cooking. She engages in mellow cultural and critical analysis, linking and tinkering on her personal website, zinzy.website .
